c.v: New Podcast from Jason Swenk: Why Agencies Need to Monitor Analytics, Not Just Report Them. Featuring Mychelle Mollot, Klipfolio CMO. Tune in here: http://jasonswenk.com/monitor-analytics/

Content and content curation is a crucial part to any marketing strategy. The process of filling your queue with compelling and meaningful content, though, can be time-consuming. UpContent streamlines this for you, pulling only the most influential and relevant content. Enhance your content marketing dashboard using @GetUpContent and these 2 bonus Klips! http://ow.ly/wDOy303jUoy

'A lot of people overlook one of the most important aspects of KPIs which is that they are a form of communication. Therefore, they abide by the same rules and best-practices as any other form of communication.' Data-driven managers want to lead their team to success. Learn how to get them there with our blog on the 17 KPIs every manager needs! http://ow.ly/WFcm303bGAa

In an increasingly digitized world, it is crucial for businesses to harness the power of search marketing. We've compiled the top 10 must-have search marketing metrics for digital marketers. Learn more about which metrics to monitor and how you can take control of your online marketing with our blog http://ow.ly/jDMS3036rT1

Come find out how the top digital marketers monitor their performance! Our new guide, 7 Dashboards Every Digital Marketer Needs, gives you access to sleek dashboard examples and inspiration, while teaching you how to create them for yourself! http://ow.ly/K1RZ3034XxG
Don't scramble to create a presentation for your board members. CEO Allan Wille has the 4 steps to follow in his post: How to prepare a killer package for your board http://ow.ly/vSd1302w5L0

facebook.name: Facebook Posts
facebook.description: See information on your 25 most recent Facebook posts including comments, likes, links, privacy settings, etc. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.label: Facebook Page
datasourceConfigModel.description: Select your company Facebook page from the drop-down list.

queries.errorMessage: From time to time, your Facebook OAuth token will expire. This token allows you to safely bring your data into Klipfolio. Find out how to re-authorize your OAuth tokens.
